item.title: Principles for Dealing with the Changing World Order
item.description: [[notes/principles]] 1. How to anticipate the future by studing the past currency devaluation: Back then paper dollars were also linked to gold which the us was running out of because it was spending more paper money checks then it had gold to exchange for them.
